content: I've been playing electric guitar for a while now, and I'm excited to explore the acoustic world. I've been focusing on my fingerstyle technique lately, and I think an acoustic would be a great addition to my setup. By the way, I've been loving my new amp, it's been a huge upgrade from my old one - I've been playing it nonstop since I got it three weeks ago. What do you think about the electronics on the GS Mini? Is it easy to plug it into a PA system or recording equipment?
